waste_items/LuzGAnL4NeAncmBNEKbV.name: Plastic Bottle
waste_items/LuzGAnL4NeAncmBNEKbV.disposalGuide: Remove cap if required. Rinse. Place in recycling bin.

waste_items/bw4KLgEBbdXLglrtdQ3U.disposalGuide: Rinse and recycle in metal recycling bin.

waste_items/fAsSVtYjPIO1ojruncZz.name: Old Phone
waste_items/fAsSVtYjPIO1ojruncZz.disposalGuide: Bring to electronic waste recycling centres.

waste_items/y6kbcuM1mWHkfTZ4S7vd.name: Paper
waste_items/y6kbcuM1mWHkfTZ4S7vd.disposalGuide: Ensure paper is clean and dry. Flatten before recycling.

waste_items/cIpDDhmqZ30bQB7cSNLQ.disposalGuide: Dispose into general waste. Do not recycle.

waste_items/X56fvVxX5C9iEgzessKT.name: Glass Bottle
waste_items/X56fvVxX5C9iEgzessKT.disposalGuide: Rinse and dispose at glass recycling points.

waste_items/1M4ngrsGAWpTES8srqZ4.description: Used or broken household light bulbs.
waste_items/1M4ngrsGAWpTES8srqZ4.disposalGuide: Do not throw into general waste. Dispose at e-waste points.

waste_items/a0dHCszzhyNhMlv6u3bV.disposalGuide: Flatten boxes before placing into recycling bin.

waste_items/gtM53H6G0cJKXeUtUEYN.name: Food Waste
waste_items/gtM53H6G0cJKXeUtUEYN.disposalGuide: Dispose into general waste bins. Do not recycle.
